I came back to Paco Meralgo at least 5 times after the first meal.  The best Patatas Bravas I had in Catalonia.  Perfectly crispy, and the chili oil and aioli gave it a nice spice kick.Highlights:-Black Pepper Steak.  I ordered this medium rare, and it came perfectly pink-red from the center out to the very edge of the meat.  Tender, flavorful, and the portion size (as with most tapas) was perfect to enjoy.  One of the best steaks of my life.  No hyperbole.-Ham and Chicken Croquettes.  Nothing complicated about these.  Just really well made croquettes full of flavor.-The Bikini.  Also nothing complicated, but a perfect grilled ham and cheese.  -Ox Tail on Mash Patatas. Dessert:-Pear soaked in red wine.  Unique!  Amazing!-Hazelnut Ice Cream tasted like a Ferrero Roche.
